snippet.title: Sonic 3 Advance - Official release trailer
snippet.description: This short release promo for our fuzzy blue friend includes full motion graphics and bespoke soundtrack - all produced in house by The Burst Proof Bubble. It went on to air on commercial TV in Germany.
